Text:
some eps in season 3 are out of order

the right order to watch the episodes in are
s03e10 - In the Forests of the Night
s03e08 - Chimes at Midnight
s03e09 - Invictus
Wow. I have been searching for this for ages! Thanks for Uploading!!
I cannot THANK YOU enough for all three seasons of this series! GREAT show - I know my grandaughter will love this!
